title: My mic and speakers are not working so the videos are not playing says error...it's been 1 year more
content: I have the problems with the mic and speakers...I thought it would be the bug of Android 10 so I downgraded to 9 but still the issue continues....the update notifications(Android 10)  coming ....so what should I do??.....is this problem is due to complaint in motherboard or some other
